# KpopPulse

> Real-time AI-translated K-pop news, personalized by your favorite idols.

## About
KpopPulse is a K-pop news aggregation service that collects articles from 15+ Korean news sources and translates them to English using AI. Users can follow their favorite idols and groups to get personalized news feeds and daily email digests.

## Data
- 40+ K-pop groups (BTS, BLACKPINK, aespa, NewJeans, SEVENTEEN, Stray Kids, etc.)
- 90+ K-pop idols with detailed profiles
- News articles updated every 15 minutes from Korean sources
- AI-translated to English with summaries

## Features
- Real-time translated K-pop news feed
- Idol and group profiles with member information
- Follow system for personalized news
- Daily email digest for subscribers
- Trending idols and groups
- Full-text search (English and Korean)
- Bookmarks for saving articles

## Pricing
- Free: 20 articles/day, follow up to 3 idols
- Pro ($4.99/mo): 200 articles/day, follow up to 20 idols, daily digest email
- Premium ($9.99/mo): Unlimited articles and follows, multi-language translations

## URL Structure
- Homepage (news feed): https://kpoppulse.app
- Idol profile: https://kpoppulse.app/idol/{slug}
- Group profile: https://kpoppulse.app/group/{slug}
- Article: https://kpoppulse.app/article/{id}
- Search: https://kpoppulse.app/search?q={query}
- Trending: https://kpoppulse.app/trending
- All groups: https://kpoppulse.app/groups
- All idols: https://kpoppulse.app/idols

## News Sources
AllKpop, Soompi, Koreaboo, Dispatch, Sports Seoul, Naver Entertainment, Chosun Ilbo, MK Sports, Star News, Seoul Economy, Newsen, Ten Asia, OSEN, Herald POP, Sports Donga

## Contact
support@kpoppulse.app
